short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Populate Listing data in Social Media Marketplaces From YBR GIG and import product info from different ecommerce marketplaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses product Information(Title, Price, Brand, Description etc.) from Yellow Brick Road GIG Application to populate Marketplace Item for Listing . It also exports product informations from Ecommerce sites(now Amazon).
